features: 💝【EASY INSTALLATION】 The screen protector is specially designed for iPhone 14 Pro Max 6.7 inch screen, 100% touch accurate. It's a three-pack and comes with an auto-alignment installation frame for effortless adhesion. Super easy to install!

💯【FULL PROTECTION】Compared to others, we provide full coverage protection from edge to edge, effectively protecting the front camera while avoiding dust buildup and not blurring it. Just the right of space around the edges to provide wide compatibility for your case.

💪【ANTI-SCRATCH & IMPACT PROTECTION】 UNBREAKcable iPhone 14 Pro Max glass screen protector is made with reinforced technology. The tempered glass protector can effectively protect your iPhone from unwanted scuffs and scratches by knife, keys and some other hard substances.

💧【BUBBLE-FREE & ANTI-FINGERPRINT】 The iPhone 14 Pro Max tempered glass screen protector will self-expel air bubble when automatically bonding with the screen. Coated with hydrophobic and oleophobic clear layers on the glass protector can against oil residue from fingerprints from long-term use.

💎【99.99% HD CLEAR】 Ultra-thin and ultra-clear material makes it retain amazing clarity for viewing experience. High-quality design and engineering, durable tempered glass to deliver the brightness, sharpness, and detail you expect from your phone screen. The visual experience is comparable to the device itself because of the crystal-clear protective layer.

🎁【WHAT YOU GET】UNBREAKcable Shatterproof Tempered Glass 3 pack, Easy Installation frame, 3 wet wipes, 3 dust absorbers, 4 dust stickers, lint-free cloth, detailed installation guide, 36-month warranty and easy-to-reach customer service at no additional ct. UNBREAKcable Support Team is always stand by your side to help.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: If you meet any problems below when you are using UNBREAKcable iPhone 14 Pro Max Screen Protector, UNBREAKcable will send you a New One: Broken/CrackAir bubblesDoesn't fit your phoneMissing Acessories

UNBREAKcable Screen Protector for iPhone 14 Pro Max-Uniquely designed to protect the Dynamic Island and crafted for seamless protection. Warm Reminder: ONLY compatible with iPhone 14 Pro Max 6.7inch. Please confirm your phone model before you purchase. (× NOT for iPhone 14 Pro！) What are the features? Super easy installation, 9H hardness, Shatterproof, Shockproof, Anti-scratches, Anti-fingerprints, HD(99.99% transparency), and bubble-free, etc. These features make the UNBREAKcable screen protector the best shield for your iPhone 14 Pro Max screen. How drop-resistant are our UNBREAKcable iPhone 14 Pro Max screen protectors? Every single piece of the UNBREAKcable iPhone 14 pro max screen protector has passed a 9H pencil test and a 10.4 kg / 23 lbs pressure test. As a result, this tempered glass screen protector keeps your display intact and flawless daily, preventing any scratches, scrapes or cracks. Frequently Asked Questions Q1: What is the specialty of this screen protector compared with much cheaper ones? A1: Our screen protector made with superior 9H tempered glass is highly durable and scratch-resistant, reinforced to be twice as strong as other ordinary tempered films on the market. 10s Super-easy Installed Auto Alignment Kit makes your installation easier than ever. This screen protector utilizes automatic adsorption technology to ensure that no bubbles can exist during the installation process. Q2: How can I get rid of bubbles? A2: Please clean the screen before installing. If there are still unwanted bubbles after installing: For big bubbles: Slowly lift one corner of the screen protector to eliminate them, then re-position the protector in place.For tiny bubbles: Use the lint-free cloth provided to gently smooth them toward the closest edge of the glass protector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well, good install tools
reviews.reviewText: Was able to install this perfectly, without crap under the glass. Good kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was easy to install. Quality is just has good has what you would pay at a phone store. Costs much less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Screen Protector I’ve Tried
reviews.reviewText: Without fangirling I have to say this is the best protector I’ve ever used. I usually spend 7$ on them and then spend $20 on wipes to apply an oleophobic coating but this glass seems to already have a oleophobic coating. My finger glides over this glass so smooth it’s surprising. Not to mention those cheap screen protectors only last a few days before they chip or crack or get scratched by keys in my pocket. I can’t speak for how long this will last without breaking but I can definitely tell it’s built different than the ones I used to buy. It’s pricey but seems worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Did not survive one drop
reviews.reviewText: Not much easier to install as others, but the frame fits really nicely, better than others. Within 3 days, phone (gently) dropped once on its protected side and already cracked. I’m glad they come in packs of three. I try to keep one extra box in stock because one day, there will just be a crack with no explanation. I have never tried to follow up with the “lifetime warranty” but I might this time. This is an expensive “supply” to keep the phone in pristine condition, which mine always are at trade-in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy as Pie
reviews.reviewText: I had absolutely no problem replacing my cracked screen saver with this one. Instructions were easy to follow and everything you need is included. No bubbles and no dust! Perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This product was very easy to apply to my phone. Important to follow directions included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Great screen protector well worth the money for my iPhone 14 Pro Max

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality protectors, great value for the price
Très bonne qualité. Facile à installer. Top !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Very good product. Very easy to fit.
reviews.reviewText: Very good product. Very easy to fit. These are the easiest and best screen protectors I had for any phone I’ve owned. The fitting frame is a great idea and immensely helpful to align the protector. I always fear for trapped air bubbles when fitting screen protectors , and, although I got a few initial as the protector settled onto the phone screen, they were easy to squeeze out and remove. Finger interaction and screen response with them fitted is great. Very smooth and seamless. Would recommend. Have used them along with a Spigen case to help protect my iPhone 14 Pro Max. Couldn’t be happier
